title: Compound circuit - circuit with variable resistor

content.description: In the circuit shown, Resistor <math alttext="R" overflow="scroll"> <mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi> </math> is a variable resistor.
content.question: What resistance must Resistor <math alttext="R" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></math> have so the potential difference across the <math alttext="1000 ohm" overflow="scroll"> <mn>1000</mn> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi> </math> resistor is <math alttext="5.0 volts" overflow="scroll"><mn>5.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></math>?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
